ygData.subject: Re: Places to hunt other than Kunark.
ygData.msgSnippet: Best place is to go to Great divide and hunt Kodiaks in K3.  This is the third cave south of the druid ring.  I didn t start hunting there till 41, but grouped
ygData.messageBody:
Best place is to go to Great divide and hunt Kodiaks in K3. This is
the third cave south of the druid ring. I didn't start hunting there
till 41, but grouped with people 35+. With a balanced group and a
good (read non-stop) puller, I was able to do 42 in a little under 4
hours. Stay there till 45, then go to guk.




--- In shadowknight@y..., kevin666 <kevin666@m...> wrote:
> Hello I am a 37th lvl Dark Elf SK, I was wondering if anyone could
> suggest a good place to hunt other than Kunark for some good Exp.
Let me
> know if there is any where worth going.
>
>
> Venan Fizzlespel
> 37th lvl SK
> Captain of the Guard for Innoruuks Revenge
> Saryrn
